attributes.action: Educating children on food and health issues.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the epidemic of food and health related diseases through thorough awareness of the most serious problem affecting our nation in the future.

Compulsory diet & food education for school children up to leaving age to make a healthier nation for their future. Legislate manufactures to make safe food and beverages.

rejection.details:
Please see: EDUCATE ON FOOD
Responsible department: Department for Education
